lines.text: How do you expect to find Sam down in this country? Texas! Phooey! No towns, no ranch houses, no gals, no nuthin'. Hah! We can't see a jack rabbit in two days. Boy, you can't tell me we're still in the United States!

[aware that the Indians are rolling boulders on the Ranger position]
Nobody but an Indian could think that up!
Sam, you got a very understanding brain... for larceny.
I found out early in life that the honest dollar is the hardest one to make.
Looks like you got me, Sam, but I'll lay my cards on the table. I'll shoot straight.

[shooting Wahoo under the table]
So will I.
Hope you'll let him in up there. He just got on the wrong trail, that's all.
[to Sam McGee during the climatic gunfight]
Sam, either you come out with your hands up, or I'm comin' in there after ya!
